item.description:
I wanted to have a gathering to meet and discuss our interests, gifts, and what ever else you would like to discuss. I would like to keep the topics, metaphysically based (healing, meditation, psychic, medium.. ect) You are all welcome to come and enjoy, bring a friend. I will bring some light refreshments, you are welcome to as well! The more the merrier.

I am combining the Salem, Ma and Haverhill groups for this meet-up. If you are unable to make the end of summer meet-up this would be a good time to catch up as well.
Time: 9am-12pm
Cost: $10

Refund Policy: I will not offer refunds, but you are welcome to take any other class or healing session as long as I get 24 hour notification of your cancellation.
item.name: Discussion group-meet your group members
